project.name: Memory Throughput Analysis

property.name: dvt.activity.description
property.value: Graphs the memory access throughput (MB/s) and/or the number of bus cycles spent waiting to access memory.

project.dvt.property:
version=1.0.0 dvt.activity.names=CSSTM dvt.activity.priority = 70
dataproviders=Trace Trace.name=Trace Viewer Trace.analyzer=Memory Throughput,Minimum Average Latency
